publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3477 Ms Sandra White: Game, Set and Match to Murray—That the Parliament congratulates Scottish tennis player, Andrew Murray, on his success in defeating UK number one-ranked player, Tim Henman, in the Davidoff Swiss Indoor tennis tournament; notes that Andrew Murray defeated Tim Henman in three sets; recognises that he is a credit to his country, and looks forward to his continued rise in the world tennis rankings. Supported by: Mrs Nanette Milne*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Rob Gibson*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Brian Adam*, Eleanor Scott*, Mr Adam Ingram*

S2M-3477 Ms Sandra White: Game, Set and Match to Murray—That the Parliament congratulates Scottish tennis player, Andrew Murray, on his success in defeating UK number one-ranked player, Tim Henman, in the Davidoff Swiss Indoor tennis tournament; notes that Andrew Murray defeated Tim Henman in three sets; recognises that he is a credit to his country, and looks forward to his continued rise in the world tennis rankings. Supported by: Mrs Nanette Milne, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Rob Gibson, Mr Mark Ruskell, Brian Adam, Eleanor Scott, Mr Adam Ingram, Mark Ballard*, Fergus Ewing*, Shiona Baird*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Jim Mather*, Christine Grahame*, Dr Jean Turner*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Chris Ballance*
S2M-3477 Game, Set and Match to Murray (lodged on 27 October 2005) Susan Deacon*, Mr Bruce McFee*
S2M-3477 Game, Set and Match to Murray (lodged on 27 October 2005) Dennis Canavan*, John Swinburne*
